src:
Mobil Sedan Terbakar di Tol JORR Arah Serpong
07 Nov 2019, 06:44 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Mobil sedan terbakar di jalan tol JORR menuju Serpong. Mobil terbakar tepatnya berada di km 18.
"Benar ada kebakaran kendaraan mobil sedan di toll Jorr sekitar pondok pinang arah Serpong di km 18," ujar petugas call center NTMC Polri Lisa saat di konfirmasi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Lisa mengatakan kebakaran tersebut telah ditangani oleh petugas. Disebutkan api telah berhasil dipadamkan.
"Informasi yang diterima kaejadian sekitar 5 menit yang lalu, sudah dalam penanganan petugas saat ini kendaraan sudah dipadamkan," kata Lisa
Belum ada informasi lebih lanjut terkait ada tidaknya korban dalam kejadian tersebut. Lalu lintas di sekitar lokasi dilaporkan ramai lancar.
"Lalu lintas di sekitar lokasi ramai lancar dan terkendali. Belum ada informasi lebih lanjut untuk korban jiwa," tuturnya

(dwia/fdu)
text:
Sedan Car Burned on JORR Toll Road in Serpong
Nov 7 2019, 06:44 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Sedan car caught fire on JORR toll road towards Serpong. The car caught fire precisely at 18 km.
"It is true that there was a sedan vehicle fire at the Jorr toll road around Pondok Pinang in the direction of Serpong at km 18," said NTMC call center officer Lisa Polri when confirmed, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Lisa said the fire had been handled by officers. It was said that the fire had been extinguished.
"The information you received about 5 minutes ago, it is being handled by officers, the vehicle has been extinguished," said Lisa
There is no further information related to the presence or absence of victims in the incident. Traffic around the location was reported to be busy smoothly.
"Traffic around the location is busy smoothly and under control. There is no further information for fatalities," he said

(dwia / fdu)
